summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Telegram Whois Bot application. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly with RTL Persian support.
passed_tests: Backend /api/health endpoint - Bot running status confirmed
Backend /api/stats endpoint - Returns proper statistics structure
Backend /api/whois/google.com endpoint - Successfully retrieves WHOIS data
Backend /api/whois/github.com endpoint - Successfully retrieves WHOIS data
Frontend dashboard loads with RTL Persian layout
Frontend search box functionality with both click and Enter key
Frontend WHOIS result display with proper Persian formatting
Frontend bot status indicator shows active state
